sections.content: Cross Country Ski Trail Conditions as of February 23, 2026 –

The trail will be groomed today for classic and skate skiing. The connector trail from the ski center to Bucks Run is no longer available.  Please know that you will have to walk to the start of the trail.  For your safety and the safety of our staff please adhere to Bucks Run hours.  Bucks Run is open Monday – Friday 12 pm – 7:45 pm and Saturday – Sunday 9 am – 7:45 pm, weather and conditions permitting.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Outstanding today - perfect groom over 28” hardpack , blue sky , sweet spot timing between 10:30 and 12:30 - simply wonderful!

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Saturday late afternoon - Mile circuit intact, skate deck fast, tracks mostly intact but icy. Great double pole conditions. Fairly clean groom, little spotty.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed with a classic track set on Sunday. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Night Skiing is Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: Winter weather returns today with a high temperature around 15 degrees. The snow has dried out with drop in temperature. The primary surface is high-quality machine groomed snow. All of our runs are open and the XC trails are in mint condition. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with great food options and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is Golumpki. The lifts will run from 9:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Bundle up and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
